blogPost.excerpt: Start creating your app with clean mind and clear representing of screen structure. There are 12 device mockups in the pack, for both iPhone and Android. Carefully created A4 format templates that perfectly repeat the real device sizes. PNG, JPG, PDF formats.
blogPost.body: Start creating your app with clean mind and clear representing of screen structure. There are 12 device mockups in the pack, for both iPhone and Android. Carefully created A4 format templates that perfectly repeat the real device sizes. PNG, JPG, PDF formats.
blogPost.title: Printables - Free printable templates for your mobile sketching
blogPost.author: Vitaly Belousov

localize.description: 以简洁的思维和清晰的画面结构开始创建你的应用程序。套件中共有12个设备模拟图，适用于iPhone和Android。精心制作的A4格式模板，完美地重复了真实设备的尺寸。PNG, JPG, PDF格式。
localize.tagline: 免费打印模板，为您的手机画草图服务

localize.description: 以簡潔的思維和清晰的畫面結構開始創建你的應用程序。套件中共有12個設備模擬圖，適用於iPhone和Android。精心製作的A4格式模板，完美地重複了真實設備的尺寸。PNG, JPG, PDF格式。
localize.tagline: 免費打印模板，爲您的手機畫草圖服務

previous.excerpt: Want to replace annoying SMS 2FA codes? We verify your users by the way they type 4 words. This improves UX significantly and reduces costs by an order of magnitude. Btw: you can get the solution free of charge for a limited time. Check the website for more.
previous.title: TypingDNA Verify - Replace SMS 2FA codes with better UX: just type 4 words

localize.description: 想取代恼人的短信2FA码？我们通过用户输入4个字的方式来验证你的用户。这大大改善了用户体验，并将成本降低了一个数量级。顺便说一下：您可以在有限的时间内免费获得该解决方案。查看网站了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用更好的用户体验取代短信2FA码：只需输入4个字即可。

localize.description: 想取代惱人的短信2FA碼？我們通過用戶輸入4個字的方式來驗證你的用戶。這大大改善了用戶體驗，並將成本降低了一個數量級。順便說一下：您可以在有限的時間內免費獲得該解決方案。查看網站了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用更好的用戶體驗取代短信2FA碼：只需輸入4個字即可。

next.excerpt: Trend brainstorms, deep dives into different ecosystem (including case studies and gaps in the market analyses), expert interviews, and niche market data to help founders and investors spot opportunities.
next.title: Opportunities.so - Deep dives, trend brainstorms, and niche data for founders

localize.description: 趋势头脑风暴，深度挖掘不同的生态系统（包括案例分析和市场分析中的差距），专家访谈和利基市场数据，帮助创始人和投资者发现机会。
localize.tagline: 为创始人提供深度挖掘、趋势头脑风暴和利基数据。

localize.description: 趨勢頭腦風暴，深度挖掘不同的生態系統（包括案例分析和市場分析中的差距），專家訪談和利基市場數據，幫助創始人和投資者發現機會。
localize.tagline: 爲創始人提供深度挖掘、趨勢頭腦風暴和利基數據。
